page.title: 20TEENAGE PASTIMES
page.content: In a survey of{teenagers pastimes 80 {youngsters aged 13 of both sexes were {questioned.} Here is a survey of their responses.The 6{popular pastimes include cycling,hanging around street corners,going to youth clubs,playing for sport teams, playing computer games and swimming. 67.5% belong to{ {21 different types of clubs}ranging from popular youth clubs to yoga classes. 65% watch an average of 4 hours of{T.V}per night. 78% enjoy{pop {music}and 64%{buy pop records. }31% spend their{spare time}with peers of the same sex, 24% with the opposite sex and 45% spend their time in mixed company. Most youths{had to be in {the house by 10.00 p.m.} The average weekly spending money is Â£3.50 . 50% felt that this area needed a leisure centre. 37% do not{attend spectator {sports.}
